website_summaries.verdict: Smooth reel for ultimate performance. Offers a desirable price versus reels with similar features.
pros: Limited friction on spool shaft, resulting in minimal vibration
Works well in a variety of fishing situations with different sizes of fish
cons: Some reels make odd noise when in use

website_summaries.verdict: Durable, with a smooth and easily adjustable cast, though its plastic parts are off-putting for some.
pros: Easy to set up and maintain
Casts far with any weight, whether using heavy or light lures
cons: Feels too plastic and flimsy for some
Reel cover can pop open if jarred
Spool can be a bit touchy

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight..Casts Long...Butter Smooth Drag
customer_reviews.text: Real is fairly light, casts long, and has a butter smooth drag. I honestly think this is about as much bang for the buck as you're going to find at this price point. Have 5 on the boat and plan to add another 5 soon.
customer_reviews.author: greenemann

customer_reviews.title: Great reel!! great price!!
customer_reviews.text: Great reel!! I am pretty serious with my bass fishing. I bought my first one for my frog rod, st croix, and bought 2 more for my flipping sticks. There great reels for the price. I will continue to buy more and more
customer_reviews.author: Mike Johnson

customer_reviews.title: and marries up beautifully with my Okuma TCSC-761H rod
customer_reviews.text: I have two Shimano Stradic 2500 HG which are fishing necessities. I just bought this Curado to replace one of my Abu's, and what a step up. Smooth casting and handling, and marries up beautifully with my Okuma TCSC-761H rod. I have Shimano's still cranking fine after 30-years of use.I now need to order another of this exact combo.
customer_reviews.author: AZ Fish'n Fun

customer_reviews.title: Super smooth and really high quality reel
customer_reviews.text: This is my third baitcasting reel and has become my go-to. Super smooth and really high quality reel. I have bought a second one with a different gear ratio to join it.
customer_reviews.author: SM

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and smooth
customer_reviews.text: Great reel, very smooth. Too bad they didn't have left handed one for me...
customer_reviews.author: CPT Dropshot

customer_reviews.title: Great reel
customer_reviews.text: Can't beat this reel. I have some lews reels and I will grab this reel over the lews bb2 pro speed spool. It cast easy and smooth. Have a fishing buddy that has cast mine a few times and he says he is considering making this reel the replacement for all of his.
customer_reviews.author: Basshunter

customer_reviews.title: Great reel, Great price
customer_reviews.text: Really solid reel. I have used Curado's in the past and have always been impressed. This is no exception. Would definitely recommend this one
customer_reviews.author: Ryan L.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: By far the smoothest and most precision made reel i have ever used.. Well worth the $.
customer_reviews.author: wacowade

customer_reviews.title: Great reel! The Curado is a must have for ...
customer_reviews.text: Great reel! The Curado is a must have for any serious fisherman! The smooth, long casts and low-friction feel on retrives make you realize exactly why the professional anglers use it so much.
customer_reviews.author: Arj

customer_reviews.title: I love this reel
customer_reviews.text: I love this reel. Wanted to try a diff type of casting but was told baitcasters were hared ot use. Not true! After a few trys and a few adjustments, it is a breeze and I can place my hook within a foot of where i want it to be. Great reel, better price!!
customer_reviews.author: david rickel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Shimano reels are the Best out there! Only reel I"ll buy and fish with!
customer_reviews.author: Ron F.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: For the price its hard to beat but nothing compares to the 200E7
customer_reviews.author: Consumer WA

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: My very first casting reel was a Shimano Bantam 1000. I still have two of them and they've been great reels for me. The Curado HG maintains that level of excellence. It does everything one could ask of modern casting reel, at a very high standard. I have several Daiwa Tatula reels (both R and reg) and its a tough call to pick between them and the Curado. Suffice to say, you couldn't go wrong with either.
customer_reviews.author: Ted Kaufman

customer_reviews.title: Love my Shimano Curado!
customer_reviews.text: Great reel at a price I have never seen before.
customer_reviews.author: Kent Kelly

customer_reviews.title: but he was very happy with it
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for a friend that does not have internet, but he was very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Janet L Overman

customer_reviews.title: Awesome reel. Initial put yo much line on it ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome reel. Initial put yo much line on it and had some bird nesting. Took a few yards out and no issues at all. Breaking system is sweet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It makes a loud screech when I cast it for ...
customer_reviews.text: It makes a loud screech when I cast it for a longer distance and I put some reel magic on it and it stopped but other than that it's been a decent reel.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great baitcaster
customer_reviews.text: Tried other brands of baitcasters. This one is not as picky about my casting technique. I can fish all day without even thinking about a back lash (the way it should be). I already own the 200i and got this high speed version for my jig setup. I set two internal brakes (really easy to get to) and adjust the external wheel as needed. One thing to note: you will not be able to get the side plate back on if you have the reel tension up pretty high. I messed with this for two days until I came across someone mentioning this. Saved me a lot of frustration. Great reel, get one in the boat.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn A.

customer_reviews.title: Great product. To bad I used snail mail and ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product. To bad I used snail mail and got it late.
customer_reviews.author: Kao Yang

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Reel
customer_reviews.text: This is one awesome reel. I'm an avid fisherman and this is one of my go to favorites! The casting is smooth and long just how I like it!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer W

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome reel!!! By far favorite in my line up. Break system works like a charm too!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pay the extra if you are in the market for  $100-175 reel
customer_reviews.text: I just don't think you can beat the Shimano Curado for the money. Smooth, casts easily, relatively low maintenance, and holds plenty of line. I have two of them and wish I had another instead of my Abu Garcia revo s.
customer_reviews.author: Andrewl07

customer_reviews.title: One smooth reel!
customer_reviews.text: Retrieve and drag are super smooth and love the 7.2-1 retrieve ratio.
customer_reviews.author: George Puhl

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: everything I have come to expect, fast shipping, quality packing and quality product
customer_reviews.author: Big John G.

customer_reviews.title: Smooth as Butter
customer_reviews.text: This is the smoothest reel I've ever used. Plan on ordering a couple more if this one holds up well.
customer_reviews.author: Fishyfred

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic baitcaster for the price, gave it a thrashing Downunder
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my fishing trip to Australia. Worked like a charm, no problems at all. Produced really long casts with very high precision. Very few over-runs (my bad anyway) and the anti-reverse is amazing. I would definitely recommend based upon the great price and spectacular performance to date. If you are considering it, think no more and get it!
customer_reviews.author: San Diego, CA

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: its not made like the green curado's but its ok
customer_reviews.author: randy sharrock

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A great reel for the price. Casting distance is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: mike guidry

customer_reviews.title: Terrible quality.
customer_reviews.text: Without much use the product jammed up and will no longer work. Completely upset with the quality of the product sold to me. If there is any way to be refunded and get a new product I will do so. If not I will definitely not be buying from J Allen Company again.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Sawicki

customer_reviews.title: Great service from Quality Outdoor
customer_reviews.text: Don't hesitate to buy from them! Awesome baitcaster by the way! I own three now. Super smooth and x ship cranks like a dream. Add braid and you have the best set up there is!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Failing Grade for 200IHG
customer_reviews.text: The slider button to open the cover is located at a bad position. Every time you twitch a lure with your left hand (right hand retrieve reel) the cover on the left side of the reel pops open. I am a big fan of Shimano but they missed the mark on this one.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny

customer_reviews.title: Wow!  Doesn't get much better
customer_reviews.text: This completes my perfect setup! Great reel. I highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Mills

customer_reviews.title: Great reel!
customer_reviews.text: Great reel for the price! Husband has already caught bass using this. He loves the low profile too. Casts nice and smooth. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: PC

customer_reviews.title: The Best!
customer_reviews.text: Curado is simply the best. I sometimes try other brands bit I am always let down. Nothing beats a curado. Fast shipping and great product!
customer_reviews.author: alex

customer_reviews.title: new curado
customer_reviews.text: Very light and smooth casting. Delivered on time. Happy with the purchase. Like how easy the new brake system is to use.
customer_reviews.author: Rick James

customer_reviews.title: Touchy over spools
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if I don't know how to use this casting reel it over spools quite a bit once you Cast have to be fast to lock the spool or end up with a rat nest of line brake mechanism is real touchy not when I expected from expensive real
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Fine reel
customer_reviews.text: I really like this real. Nice solid feel, have not had any backlash issues. Would by again. Also really like the Lews reels.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff S

customer_reviews.title: Salt water.
customer_reviews.text: This has become my favorite reel in my collection. I use it for both bass fishing as well as salt water flats. It has never failed me even after all the salt water that it has seen. Just make sure to do proper maintenance after being in contact with salt.
customer_reviews.author: Chris L.

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: The reel is junk. All of these good reviews must be from Shimano. I have 3 friends that also have the 200 model reel, and all of them make a horrible noise when you throw them. Shimano you let down after 20 years of using your reels. Im looking for something different now.
customer_reviews.author: CarrMann

customer_reviews.title: Right out of the box it sounded horrible had to send it right back to shimano I ...
customer_reviews.text: Right out of the box it sounded horrible had to send it right back to shimano I would never buy this reel again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: commodity exchange
customer_reviews.text: hello, I'm waiting on the stock shimano cured product i201HG, because I received a healed i200 Shimano HG right hand and I use my left hand. I hope to make the change and how to step by step exchange. thank you
customer_reviews.author: Antonio nunes da costa junior

customer_reviews.title: still havent mastered casting more than a few tries without bad backlashes.
customer_reviews.text: make sure you have help or already know how to cast with this type of reel, still havent mastered casting more than a few tries without bad backlashes .
customer_reviews.author: mark Buford

product_meta.title: Shimano Curado 200 IHG right hand baitcast fishing reel, CU200IHG
product_meta.description: From an angling perspective, every individual who has owned and enjoyed using Shimano tackle has a reason to thank a Japanese visionary named Shozaburo Shimano, who in 1921 declared "I aim to make Shimano's products the best in Kansai, then the best in Japan, and finally the best in the world." For over 80 years, Shimano has concentrated on precision engineering, one step at a time. Creating the most innovative products and processes you can hold in your hand today.
feature_bullets: High gear baitcast spinning fishing reel, Gear ratio: 7.2:1, Retrieve: right
Weight: 7.40 ounce, max. dragforce: 12 lbs, bearings: 5 S ARB

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
